house_listing.house_description: Prime location with views. 3-car garage - elevator. Quality construction. By john mamoudis. Design by ed rhoem. No comps available on this design. Estimated completion march 2000.
house_listing.firm_name: The Prudential Decker Realty The Prudential Decker Realty
